name: zero_add
statement: theorem zero_add (n : MyNat) : add zero n = n := by
proof:
theorem zero_add (n : MyNat) : add zero n = n := by
  induction n with
  | zero => exact add_zero zero
  | succ d ih => rw [add_succ, ih]

name: succ_add
statement: theorem succ_add (a b : MyNat) : add (succ a) b = succ (add a b)  := by
proof:
theorem succ_add (a b : MyNat) : add (succ a) b = succ (add a b) := by
  induction b with
  | zero =>
    rw [add_zero, add_zero]
  | succ d ih =>
    rw [add_succ, ih, add_succ]
known_theorems: theorem zero_add (n : MyNat) : add zero n = n := by

name: add_comm
statement: theorem add_comm (a b : MyNat) : add a b = add b a := by
proof:
theorem add_comm (a b : MyNat) : add a b = add b a := by
  induction a with
  | zero =>
      rw [zero_add, add_zero]
  | succ a ih =>
      rw [succ_add, add_succ, ih]

name: add_assoc
statement: theorem add_assoc (a b c : MyNat) : add (add a b) c = add a (add b c) := by
proof:
theorem add_assoc (a b c : MyNat) : add (add a b) c = add a (add b c) := by
  induction c with
  | zero =>
      rw [add_zero, add_zero]
      trivial
  | succ k ih =>
      rw [add_succ, ih, add_succ, add_succ]
      trivial

name: add_right_comm
statement: theorem add_right_comm (a b c : MyNat) : add (add a b) c = add (add a c) b := by
proof:
theorem add_right_comm (a b c : MyNat) : add (add a b) c = add (add a c) b := by
  calc
    add (add a b) c = add a (add b c) := by rw [add_assoc]
    _ = add a (add c b) := by rw [add_comm b c]
    _ = add (add a c) b := by rw [add_assoc]

  intro h
  rw [succ_add, succ_add, zero_add] at h
  have h1 := succ_inj (succ (succ (succ zero))) (succ (succ (succ (succ zero)))) h
  have h2 := succ_inj (succ (succ zero)) (succ (succ (succ zero))) h1
  have h3 := succ_inj (succ zero) (succ (succ zero)) h2
  have h4 := succ_inj zero (succ zero) h3
  exact zero_ne_one h4

name: add_algo_1
statement: theorem add_algo_1 (a b c d : MyNat) : add (add a b) (add c d) = add (add (add a c) d) b := by
proof:
theorem add_algo_1 (a b c d : MyNat) : add (add a b) (add c d) = add (add (add a c) d) b := by
  calc
    add (add a b) (add c d) = add a (add b (add c d)) := by rw [add_assoc]
    _ = add a (add (add b c) d) := by rw [← add_assoc]
    _ = add a (add (add c b) d) := by rw [add_comm b c]
    _ = add a (add c (add b d)) := by rw [add_assoc]
    _ = add (add a c) (add b d) := by rw [← add_assoc]
    _ = add (add (add a c) b) d := by rw [← add_assoc]
    _ = add (add (add a c) d) b := by rw [add_right_comm]

name: mul_pow
statement: theorem mul_pow (a b n : MyNat) : pow (mul a b) n = mul (pow a n) (pow b n) := by
proof:
theorem mul_pow (a b n : MyNat) : pow (mul a b) n = mul (pow a n) (pow b n) := by
  induction n with
  | zero =>
    -- Base case: n = zero
    rw [pow_zero, pow_zero, pow_zero, mul_one]
  | succ k ih =>
    -- Induction step: n = succ k
    rw [pow_succ, pow_succ, pow_succ, ih]
    calc
      mul (mul (pow a k) (pow b k)) (mul a b)
          = mul (pow a k) (mul (pow b k) (mul a b)) := by rw [mul_assoc]
      _ = mul (pow a k) (mul (mul (pow b k) a) b) := by rw [← mul_assoc]
      _ = mul (pow a k) (mul (mul a (pow b k)) b) := by rw [mul_comm (pow b k) a]
      _ = mul (pow a k) (mul a (mul (pow b k) b)) := by rw [mul_assoc]
      _ = mul (mul (pow a k) a) (mul (pow b k) b) := by rw [← mul_assoc]

name: add_sq
statement: theorem add_sq (a b : MyNat) : pow (add a b) two = add (add (pow a two) (pow b two)) (mul (mul two a) b) := by
proof:
theorem add_sq (a b : MyNat) : pow (add a b) two = add (add (pow a two) (pow b two)) (mul (mul two a) b) := by
  -- Expand LHS using pow_two
  rw [pow_two]
  -- Expand RHS: rewrite pow a two and pow b two using pow_two
  rw [pow_two, pow_two]
  -- Rewrite mul two a as add a a using two_mul
  have h : mul two a = add a a := by rw [two_mul]
  rw [h]
  -- Expand mul (add a a) b using add_mul
  rw [add_mul]
  -- Expand LHS: use mul_add to break into two terms
  rw [mul_add]
  -- Expand each term using add_mul
  have h1 : mul (add a b) a = add (mul a a) (mul b a) := by rw [add_mul]
  have h2 : mul (add a b) b = add (mul a b) (mul b b) := by rw [add_mul]
  rw [h1, h2]
  -- Use commutativity of multiplication to rewrite mul b a as mul a b
  rw [mul_comm b a]
  -- Rearrange LHS to match RHS using associativity and commutativity of addition
  calc
    add (add (mul a a) (mul a b)) (add (mul a b) (mul b b))
      = add (mul a a) (add (mul a b) (add (mul a b) (mul b b))) := by rw [add_assoc]
    _ = add (mul a a) (add (add (mul a b) (mul a b)) (mul b b)) := by rw [← add_assoc]
    _ = add (mul a a) (add (mul b b) (add (mul a b) (mul a b))) := by
        rw [add_comm (add (mul a b) (mul a b)) (mul b b)]
    _ = add (add (mul a a) (mul b b)) (add (mul a b) (mul a b)) := by rw [add_assoc]

name: add_right_cancel
statement: theorem add_right_cancel (a b n : MyNat) : add a n = add b n → a = b := by
proof:
theorem add_right_cancel (a b n : MyNat) : add a n = add b n → a = b := by
  induction n with
  | zero =>
    intro h
    rw [add_zero, add_zero] at h
    exact h
  | succ d ih =>
    intro h
    rw [add_succ, add_succ] at h
    have h' : add a d = add b d := succ_inj _ _ h
    exact ih a b h'

name: le_antisymm
statement: theorem le_antisymm (x y : MyNat) (hxy : le x y) (hyx : le y x) : x = y := by
proof:
theorem le_antisymm (x y : MyNat) (hxy : le x y) (hyx : le y x) : x = y := by
  cases hxy with
  | intro c1 h1 =>
    cases hyx with
    | intro c2 h2 =>
      rw [h2] at h1
      rw [add_assoc] at h1
      have h3 : add (add c2 c1) y = y := by
        rw [add_comm (add c2 c1) y]
        exact Eq.symm h1
      have h4 : add c2 c1 = zero := add_right_eq_self (x := add c2 c1) (y := y) h3
      have h5 : c2 = zero := add_right_eq_zero (a := c2) (b := c1) h4
      have h6 : c1 = zero := add_left_eq_zero (a := c2) (b := c1) h4
      rw [h6] at h1
      rw [h5] at h2
      rw [add_zero] at h1
      rw [add_zero] at h2
      exact h2

name: le_total
statement: theorem le_total (x y : MyNat) : (le x y) ∨ (le y x) := by
proof:
theorem le_total (x y : MyNat) : (le x y) ∨ (le y x) := by
  induction x with
  | zero =>
    left
    exact zero_le y
  | succ x' ih =>
    cases y with
    | zero =>
      right
      exact zero_le (succ x')
    | succ y' =>
      have h := ih y'
      cases h with
      | inl h_left =>
        left
        cases h_left with
        | intro c hc =>
          use c
          rw [hc, succ_add]
      | inr h_right =>
        right

name: le_one
statement: theorem le_one (x : MyNat) (hx : le x one) : x = zero ∨ x = one := by
proof:
theorem le_one (x : MyNat) (hx : le x one) : x = zero ∨ x = one := by
  cases hx with
  | intro c hc =>
    cases x with
    | zero =>
      left
      rfl
    | succ d =>
      right
      rw [one_eq_succ_zero, succ_add] at hc
      apply succ_inj at hc
      have h4 : d = zero := add_right_eq_zero d c (Eq.symm hc)
      rw [h4]
      rfl

name: le_two
statement: theorem le_two (x : MyNat) (hx : le x two) : x = zero ∨ x = one ∨ x = two := by
proof:
theorem le_two (x : MyNat) (hx : le x two) : x = zero ∨ x = one ∨ x = two := by
  rcases hx with ⟨c, h⟩
  cases x with
  | zero =>
    left
    rfl
  | succ a =>
    rw [succ_add] at h
    rw [two_eq_succ_one] at h
    have h4 : one = add a c := succ_inj one (add a c) h
    have h5 : le a one := ⟨c, h4⟩
    rcases le_one a h5 with (ha | ha)
    · right; left
      rw [ha]
      rfl
    · right; right
      rw [ha]
      rfl

name: le_mul_right
statement: theorem le_mul_right (a b : MyNat) (h : mul a b ≠ zero) : le a (mul a b) := by
proof:
theorem le_mul_right (a b : MyNat) (h : mul a b ≠ zero) : le a (mul a b) := by
  have hb : b ≠ zero := by
    intro hb0
    rw [hb0, mul_zero] at h
    exact h rfl
  rcases eq_succ_of_ne_zero b hb with ⟨k, hk⟩
  rw [hk]
  use mul a k
  rw [mul_succ, add_comm]

name: mul_right_eq_one
statement: theorem mul_right_eq_one (x y : MyNat) (h : mul x y = one) : x = one := by
proof:
theorem mul_right_eq_one (x y : MyNat) (h : mul x y = one) : x = one := by
  have one_ne_zero : one ≠ zero := by
    rw [one_eq_succ_zero]
    exact zero_ne_succ zero
  have prod_ne_zero : mul x y ≠ zero := by
    rw [h]
    exact one_ne_zero
  have le_x_prod : le x (mul x y) := le_mul_right x y prod_ne_zero
  have le_x_one : le x one := by
    rw [h] at le_x_prod
    exact le_x_prod
  have x_ne_zero : x ≠ zero := by
    intro hx
    rw [hx, zero_mul] at h
    exact one_ne_zero h
  cases le_one x le_x_one with
  | inl hx_zero =>
      exfalso
      exact x_ne_zero hx_zero
  | inr hx_one =>
      exact hx_one

name: mul_ne_zero
statement: theorem mul_ne_zero (a b : MyNat) (ha : a ≠ zero) (hb : b ≠ zero) : mul a b ≠ zero := by
proof:
theorem mul_ne_zero (a b : MyNat) (ha : a ≠ zero) (hb : b ≠ zero) : mul a b ≠ zero := by
  have ha' := eq_succ_of_ne_zero a ha
  have hb' := eq_succ_of_ne_zero b hb
  rcases ha' with ⟨a0, rfl⟩
  rcases hb' with ⟨b0, rfl⟩
  intro h
  rw [mul_succ] at h
  have h2 := add_left_eq_zero _ _ h
  exact (zero_ne_succ a0).symm h2

name: mul_eq_zero
statement: theorem mul_eq_zero (a b : MyNat) (h : mul a b = zero) : a = zero ∨ b = zero := by
proof:
theorem mul_eq_zero (a b : MyNat) (h : mul a b = zero) : a = zero ∨ b = zero := by
  contrapose! h
  have ha : a ≠ zero := by
    intro hz
    apply h
    left
    exact hz
  have hb : b ≠ zero := by
    intro hz
    apply h
    right
    exact hz
  exact mul_ne_zero a b ha hb

name: mul_left_cancel
statement: theorem mul_left_cancel (a b c : MyNat) (ha : a ≠ zero) (h : mul a b = mul a c) : b = c := by
proof:
theorem mul_left_cancel (a b c : MyNat) (ha : a ≠ zero) (h : mul a b = mul a c) : b = c := by
  revert c
  induction b with
  | zero =>
      intro c h
      rw [mul_zero] at h
      have h' := mul_eq_zero a c (Eq.symm h)
      cases h' with
      | inl ha' => contradiction
      | inr hc => exact hc.symm
  | succ d ih =>
      intro c h
      rw [mul_succ] at h
      cases c with
      | zero =>
          rw [mul_zero] at h
          have h2 := add_left_eq_zero (mul a d) a h
          contradiction
      | succ e =>
          rw [mul_succ] at h
          have h3 := add_right_cancel (mul a d) (mul a e) a h
          exact congr_arg succ (ih e h3)

name: mul_right_eq_self
statement: theorem mul_right_eq_self (a b : MyNat) (ha : a ≠ zero) (h : mul a b = a) : b = one := by
proof:

  apply mul_left_cancel a b one ha
  rw [mul_one]
  exact h
